member.name: IMFPMPServer.CreateObjectByCLSID
member.summary: Creates an object in the protected media path (PMP) process.
member.param: CLSID of the object to create.
Interface identifier of the interface to retrieve.
Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFPMPServer.LockProcess
member.summary: Blocks the protected media path (PMP) process from ending.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFPMPServer.UnlockProcess
member.summary: Decrements the lock count on the protected media path (PMP) process. Call this method once for each call to .

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFPMPServer
member.summary: Enables two instances of the Media Session to share the same protected media path (PMP) process.
